name: Boat'em'Up
description:
Boat'Em'Up is a mobile game where you can customize your ship to fight enemies in 5 arenas. You'll follow the storyline of a mad crew and open some loot box to collect new equipment ! Blow up them !

Student Mobile Game made for Android.
Supinfogame Rubika 2019 Year 3.
Team Development : Gary BOUTRY, Sébastien BUTOR, Pierre SORIOT, Nathan FRANCO STUCKLIN, Pierre-Louis NICOLAS, Capucine TOUSSAINT, Sacha RIVIERE, Victoire DECOOL
